com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.listeners

Class SpectatorsInteractionsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgcraft.spectatorplus.listeners.SpectatorsInteractionsListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class SpectatorsInteractionsListener
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpectatorsInteractionsListener() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBlockBreak(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBreakEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators from breaking blocks.
      void onBlockCanBuild(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockCanBuildEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators from blocking players from placing blocks.
      void onBlockPlace(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPlaceEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators from placing blocks, and to teleport spectators blocking players from placing blocks.
      void onEntityDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent ev)
      Used to prevent players & mobs from damaging spectators, and stop the fire display when a spectator comes out of a fire/lava block.
      void onEntityDamageEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent e)
      Cancels any damage taken or caused by a spectator.
      void onEntityHitByProjectileEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent ev)
      Makes non-potions projectiles fly through the spectators.
      void onEntityTarget(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityTargetEvent ev)
      Used to prevent the mobs to be interested by (and aggressive against) spectators.
      void onHangingBreakByEntity(org.bukkit.event.hanging.HangingBreakByEntityEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators breaking hangings (ItemFrame, LeashHitch or Painting)
      void onInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent ev)
      Cancels inventories interactions for the spectators.
      void onInventoryDrag(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryDragEvent ev)
      Cancels inventories interactions for the spectators.
      void onPlayerDropItem(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerDropItemEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators from dropping items on ground.
      void onPlayerInteract(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
      Used to prevent any interaction on blocks (item frames, buttons, levers, pressure plates...).
      void onPlayerInteractAtEntity(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent ev)
      Used to prevent the following whilst spectating: Modifying ArmorStands other cases where interaction occurs AT an entity
      void onPlayerInteractEntity(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent ev)
      Used to prevent any interaction on entities
      void onPlayerPickupItem(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityPickupItemEvent ev)
      Used to prevent spectators from picking up items.
      void onPlayerSwapHandItems(fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.events.WrappedEvent ev) 
      void onPlayerUseContainer(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
      Cancels chest opening animation, doors, anything when the player right clicks.
      void onPlayerUseDoor(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
      Cancel the use of the doors, trapdoors, etc.
      void onPotionSplash(org.bukkit.event.entity.PotionSplashEvent ev)
      Used to make splash potions flew by the spectators.
      void onVehicleDamage(org.bukkit.event.vehicle.VehicleDamageEvent e)
      Stops players trying to break entities such as Minecarts, Boats, etc.
      void onVehicleEnter(org.bukkit.event.vehicle.VehicleEnterEvent e)
      Stops spectators riding horses, Minecarts, etc.

        public void onEntityDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent ev)

      • onPlayerInteractEntity

        public void onPlayerInteractEntity(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent ev)
        Used to prevent any interaction on entities

      • onPlayerInteract

        public void onPlayerInteract(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
        Used to prevent any interaction on blocks (item frames, buttons, levers, pressure plates...). If the Skript integration is enabled, the event is not cancelled and Skript users will have to cancel the event.

        See https://github.com/pgmann/SpectatorPlus/pull/38.

      • onPlayerInteractAtEntity

        public void onPlayerInteractAtEntity(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent ev)
        Used to prevent the following whilst spectating:
        • Modifying ArmorStands
        • other cases where interaction occurs AT an entity

      • onHangingBreakByEntity

        public void onHangingBreakByEntity(org.bukkit.event.hanging.HangingBreakByEntityEvent ev)
        Used to prevent spectators breaking hangings (ItemFrame, LeashHitch or Painting)

      • onPlayerDropItem

        public void onPlayerDropItem(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerDropItemEvent ev)
        Used to prevent spectators from dropping items on ground.

      • onPlayerPickupItem

        public void onPlayerPickupItem(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityPickupItemEvent ev)
        Used to prevent spectators from picking up items.

      • onPlayerUseDoor

        public void onPlayerUseDoor(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
        Cancel the use of the doors, trapdoors, etc.

        This event is not directly cancelled as the cancellation is part of the onPlayerInteract(PlayerInteractEvent) event handler.

      • onPlayerUseContainer

        public void onPlayerUseContainer(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent ev)
        Cancels chest opening animation, doors, anything when the player right clicks.

        This event is not directly cancelled as the cancellation is part of the onPlayerInteract(PlayerInteractEvent) event handler.

      • onVehicleEnter

        public void onVehicleEnter(org.bukkit.event.vehicle.VehicleEnterEvent e)
        Stops spectators riding horses, Minecarts, etc.

      • onVehicleDamage

        public void onVehicleDamage(org.bukkit.event.vehicle.VehicleDamageEvent e)
        Stops players trying to break entities such as Minecarts, Boats, etc.
